body:
Active Server: TELLUS

Update: Ok, seems like this thing doesn't work anymore. I tried again mczone01 but gets Loading forever. Anyways, try to use it, if it works good for you, else i'm sorry :C

As you may notice for some reason you can't connect to Avicus using the normal IP (avic.us).
The problem is that the Hubs servers crashed for some reason. Also, some game servers (Nebula01 for example) crashed too.
There is a way to still connect to Avicus:
You can use GameServers IP like mczone01.avic.us and then use the /server command.
Known available servers at the momment (the ones i know):
  • mczone02.avic.us
  • nexus02.avic.us (here is where everyone is right now)
  • mczone03.avic.us
  • icarus.avic.us
  • tellus.avic.us
Hope Staff can solve this problem and let us join without using these IP's.

Thanks for reading.
~Netux

title: -◖ Ways to join Avicus ◗- | Active Server OwO

replies.body: Server is down again! But don't worry, join mczone02.avic.us and lets get a game going !
replies.body_tagged: Server is down again! But don't worry, join mczone02.avic.us and lets get a game going !

replies.body: Also, try using direct connect if "Add Server" does not work for you.

replies.body: I removed the "Hub" addresses and they are down more than they are up. I connect to Nebula04 then go to hub if its open.
